name: Lexicon [Dark Theme]
description: Lexicon, a mod menu unlike no other. It's available for PS3 and can be bought from NextGenUpdate. If you are modding at night or love to participate in the Lexicon Chat like myself, then I would recommend using this dark theme to help your eyes. ^~^

user.name: midnightvibes
user.about:
hello there. i'm midnight and i make modern sites darker for the purpose of helping your eyes.
i recommend using this theme to view userstyles on: https://userstyles.org/styles/105609/userstyles-dark-aperopia 


i also mix/promote music, share aesthetics, and other things here:
- https://www.instagram.com/thebeautifulvibe/
- http://itsmidnightyo.tumblr.com/
- http://weheartit.com/itsmidnightyo
- https://twitter.com/itsmidnightyo
